name: Murder
description:
by Craww Hauntingly beautiful, a wonderful version of Craww's painting of 'Murder' painted in Black. Based on a doodle from his Moleskine book, the black study went on to become a magnificent painting, now available from the De La Main art gallery in London. 'Murder' in black, had a very short print run of 10 copies, signed by the artist Craww,
  • 500mm x 210mm
  • Giclee art print on 309gsm Hahnemuhle photo rag with archival inks
  • Ultra small limited edition of 10
  • Signed by the artist
  • 2012

name: Mind Form IV
description:
by Naoto Hattori There is a sense of wonder and breath taking beauty in this piece. The face is serene, but the mind a surreal and psychedelic form. Naoto Hattori paints in such gorgeous detail, and his pieces are sought after world wide. This is a rare print and was only available for sale during the 24 hours of 30 August 2012, all 50 prints were sold.
  • 12” x 16”
  • Giclee on Matte Velvet Art Paper
  • One of a limited edition of 50 prints in a 24 Hour run
  • 2012

name: Sundown
description:
by Dan May A wonderful painting that was part of Dan May's exhibition 'Gentle Creatures' from November 2012. The exhibition sold out extremely quickly. Sundown is a glorious rich and warming painting, depiciting a Sparrow on top of a Sunflower head in the Autumn. A wonderful chance to purchase this sought after piece, Dan May's paintings and prints are incredibly collectable and sell out very quickly.
  • 6” x 6”
  • Acrylic on Wood Panel
  • An original painting signed by artist
  • 2012

name: Sculpting Grace
description:
by Charmaine Olivia A beautiful and stunning piece from a highly collectable artist, one of her early musings and experiments with colour.

"To me, it feels like sculpting. Molding and shaping the colors with my brush. Up close, it almost feels haphazard and frantic. But from a distance, it all comes together with seemingly careless grace. Even the way she's clutching her hair feels like she's sculpting right along with me." - Charmaine Olivia

  • 13” x 19” inches
  • Giclee print on Entrada Rag Bright 300 g/m2 paper with UltraChrome K3 ink
  • A sold out limited signed edition of 50
  • Comes with Certificate of Authenticity
''Sculpting Grace'' comes with a guarantee that each work has been hand inspected and signed by the artist, meeting all quality standards, making it a true work of art

name: Daft Tom & Daft Guy
description:
by Matt Taylor To celebrate the release of the Daft Punk sinlge 'Get Lucky' Phenomenal UK illustrator Matt Taylor created a pair of amazing images featuring the Daft Punk duo in their most recent incarnations and he’s done an incredible job. Here are Guy Manuel de Homem-Christo and Thomas Bangalter in full robot regalia. Enjoy!
  • Both sized at 11" x 14" inches
  • Archival Giclée Prints
  • A sold out signed and numbered strictly limited to 56 and 51 respectively
  • Only £85 for the pair
